story: In the heart of the forest, a little skunk named Scout loved to play hide-and-seek with her forest friends. Her distinctive scent made her a bit wary of getting too close, but her bright eyes and twitching tail won everyone over. One day, Scout stumbled upon a lost rabbit, shivering with fear. Without hesitation, she curled up beside the rabbit, offering her warm and cozy scent to calm its nerves. The rabbit soon relaxed, and thanks to Scout's kindness, they became inseparable. From then on, Scout was known as the forest's resident peacemaker, spreading joy and friendship wherever she went.
